channel.title: New Silent Hill movie details emerge
channel.description:
![](upload://aEyQuR6Ul9Q9NtmpfV6oQkizcDF.jpeg) [quote] [i]"For years, Heather Mason and her father have been on the run, always one step ahead of dangerous forces that she doesn't fully understand," the synopsis reads. "Now on the eve of her 18th birthday, plagued by terrifying nightmares and the disappearance of her father, Heather discovers she's not who she thinks she is. The revelation leads her deeper into a demonic world that threatens to trap her in Silent Hill forever."[/i] [/quote] Hope you liked Silent Hill 3 cause they're making a movie out of it. Personally I can't wait. The Silent Hill movie was one of the few gametomovie adaptations that went well.
[url]https://www.gamespot.com/news/6283501.html?tag=latestheadlines;title;4[/url]

item.title: New Silent Hill movie details emerge
item.dc:creator: Patonki
item.description:
blue:

Man, i also loved sh2 best, but its funny how everybody call it the best horror game nowdays, i remember first reviews, and it was doing really bad, most i saw were 5-6/10

yeah, because it was doing a new thing
it wasn’t fun
it was trying to convey different emotions, like dread and exhaustion

well okay not that new since sh1 was already out

also if there is any mention of pyramid head on the previews the movie will god damn suck

Read full topic

item.title: New Silent Hill movie details emerge
item.dc:creator: Flatline
item.description:
Omega_Absolute:

The rating doesn’t matter. Look at how many “Great!” games there are these days (super high ratings) that fucking suck so bad.

I’m curious about the actors that will be playing in the new movie. I’d love to see Sean Bean back.

Regardless of how accurately they follow the game’s storyline (and they can’t absolutely because of what they’ve already done) I can’t see there being a place for Sean Bean’s character.

Read full topic

item.description:
I’ve never played the game, but Silent Hill had some of the most disturbing deaths I have ever seen anywhere.
I hope the second movie is just as fucked up.

item.title: New Silent Hill movie details emerge
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
I agree that SH2 is the best game, though I prefer the story they went with in the movie to the one in the games. I’m looking forward to this.

I hope they use as little CG in this as they did in the first film. Those monsters were hella scary and the people in those suits were real talented.

Read full topic

I hope they include the scene of the bathroom

item.title: New Silent Hill movie details emerge
item.dc:creator: Omega_Absolute
item.description:
“For years, Heather Mason and her father have been on the run, always one step ahead of dangerous forces that she doesn’t fully understand,” the synopsis reads. “Now on the eve of her 18th birthday, plagued by terrifying nightmares and the disappearance of her father, Heather discovers she’s not who she thinks she is. The revelation leads her deeper into a demonic world that threatens to trap her in Silent Hill forever.”

Hope you liked Silent Hill 3 cause they’re making a movie out of it.
Personally I can’t wait. The Silent Hill movie was one of the few gametomovie adaptations that went well.

https://www.gamespot.com/news/6283501.html?tag=latestheadlines;title;4
